02-62-22 23 MEMORANDUM July 18, 2
To
: Kr. E. L. Hirshberg, Program Officer, US AID/C
From
: C. C. Chang, Chief, Second Divisio@riginal signed by
Subject
: Excess Equipment C. C. Chang Project No. Y-99-AX(99-471)
THE requested procurement of tractor, wire rope, control, lathe, welder, aggregate loader, xetering guns and com- pressor as shown in the attached list. If you concur and they are available, please initiate necessary action for acquisition and shipment to Taiwan. Pertinent Reports of Excess Equipment are also attached herewith.
H
